name: Chicken Alfredo Garlic Bread
instructions: Cook seasoned chicken in butter until internal temperature reaches 165°F
Make Alfredo sauce: melt butter, add garlic, pour in heavy cream and simmer, then add Parmesan
Mix softened butter with garlic and parsley for garlic butter
Spread garlic butter on split bread halves
Add mozzarella cheese, sliced chicken, and drizzle Alfredo sauce
Bake at 350°F for 20-25 minutes until cheese is melted and golden

name: Chicken Pesto Quesadilla
instructions: Spread pesto sauce evenly on one side of tortilla
Add sliced chicken breast on half of the tortilla
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over chicken
Fold tortilla in half
Toast in a pan over medium heat until golden on both sides
Cheese should be melted and tortilla crispy
Cut into wedges and serve

name: BBQ Ranch Chicken Pita
instructions: Mix diced chicken with BBQ sauce and Greek yogurt ranch
Warm pita bread slightly
Open pita pocket
Line inside with fresh lettuce
Stuff with BBQ ranch chicken mixture
Serve immediately

name: Chicken Mac & Cheese Protein Bowl
instructions: Cook high-protein pasta according to package directions
Steam broccoli until tender-crisp
Heat light cheese sauce in a pot
Combine cooked pasta with cheese sauce
Add diced chicken and broccoli
Stir well and serve hot

name: Protein Pizza Roll-Ups
instructions: Lay low-carb wrap flat
Spread marinara sauce evenly
Sprinkle shredded mozzarella
Add diced chicken pieces
Roll up tightly
Air fry at 375°F for 5-7 minutes until crispy
Slice and serve hot

name: Buffalo Chicken Rice Cakes
instructions: Mix shredded chicken with buffalo sauce
Spread buffalo chicken mixture on rice cakes
Drizzle with Greek yogurt ranch
Serve immediately
Can be eaten cold or warm

name: Chicken Taco Flatbread
instructions: Season chicken with taco seasoning and cook
Spread salsa evenly on flatbread
Add seasoned chicken pieces
Sprinkle shredded cheese on top
Bake at 400°F for 8-10 minutes until cheese melts
Slice and serve hot

name: Garlic Herb Chicken Melt Sandwich
instructions: Mix Greek yogurt with garlic powder and herbs for spread
Spread yogurt herb sauce on both slices of bread
Layer sliced chicken on one slice
Add provolone cheese slices
Top with second slice of bread
Toast in skillet over medium heat until golden and cheese melts
Serve hot

name: Chicken Alfredo Pizza Toast
instructions: Toast bread slices until lightly crispy
Spread cauliflower alfredo sauce on each slice
Add diced chicken pieces
Top with shredded mozzarella
Broil for 2-3 minutes until cheese is bubbly
Serve hot

name: BBQ Chicken Nacho Plate
instructions: Mix shredded chicken with Greek yogurt ranch and BBQ sauce
Arrange baked tortilla chips on plate
Top chips with BBQ ranch chicken mixture
Optional: Sprinkle cheese and microwave 30 seconds to melt
Serve immediately

name: Chicken Pesto Stuffed Tortilla
instructions: Lay tortilla flat
Spread pesto sauce in center
Layer sliced chicken, mozzarella, and spinach
Fold tortilla sides in and roll tightly
Pan-toast over medium heat until golden on all sides
Cheese should be melted inside
Slice and serve hot

name: Chicken Caesar Melt
instructions: Mix diced chicken with Greek yogurt Caesar dressing
Place chicken Caesar mixture on one slice of bread
Sprinkle with parmesan cheese
Top with second slice of bread
Toast in skillet until bread is golden and cheese melts
Open sandwich and add fresh romaine lettuce
Serve immediately

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sloppy Joes
description: Sweet & Savory Twist on Classic Sloppy Joes
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef (85% lean) or ground turkey
1/2 cup grape jelly or strawberry jam (or sugar-free version)
Optional toppings: pickles, coleslaw, sliced onions
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat, breaking it up as it cooks
Drain excess fat if necessary
Reduce heat to medium-low
Add peanut butter, jelly, soy sauce, and apple cider vinegar to the skillet
Stir until peanut butter and jelly are melted and well combined with the meat
Add garlic powder, onion powder, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper
Simmer for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until sauce thickens
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed
Toast hamburger buns if desired
Spoon meat mixture generously onto bottom buns
Add optional toppings if desired
Top with bun and serve immediately

name: High Protein Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 2 oz Goodles high-protein noodles (or any protein pasta)
¼ cup shredded cheese of choice (cheddar, mozzarella, or blend)
instructions: Cook pasta separately according to package directions; drain and set aside
In a blender, combine cottage cheese, milk, and seasonings; blend until smooth and creamy
Pour blended sauce into a saucepan over low heat
Add shredded cheese and whisk until melted and smooth
Fold in the cooked pasta and stir until fully coated and creamy
Serve warm

name: Buffalo Chicken Bacon Quesadillas
ingredients: 40 oz raw boneless skinless chicken breast
½ cup bacon bits or cooked crumbled bacon
2 cups fat-free cottage cheese (for buffalo sauce)
6 oz reduced-fat cream cheese (for buffalo sauce)
½ cup buffalo sauce (for buffalo sauce)
½ cup fat-free milk (for buffalo sauce)
½ tsp black pepper (for buffalo sauce)
instructions: Add raw chicken, ½ cup buffalo sauce, garlic salt, black pepper, onion powder, and 2 Tbsp ranch seasoning to a slow cooker
Cook on HIGH 2-3 hours or LOW 5-6 hours until shreddable
Shred chicken in the pot with two forks
Blend cottage cheese, cream cheese, ½ cup buffalo sauce, milk, and black pepper until smooth for the buffalo sauce
Pour sauce into slow cooker; add most of the bacon bits and chives (save a little for topping); mix everything
On one half of a tortilla: add ~⅓ cup mozzarella → heaping ¾ cup buffalo chicken mix → another ~⅓ cup mozzarella + extra bacon/chives → fold over
Cook in nonstick pan over medium heat 3-4 min per side until golden and melty (or air-fry 375°F for 7-9 min, flip once)
Wrap in foil for meal prep and freeze

name: High Protein Pepperoni Pizza Calzones
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F or preheat air fryer to 375°F
In a large bowl, combine the flour, Greek yogurt, and salt; mix until clumps form
Knead the mixture by hand until a smooth dough ball forms
Transfer dough to a lightly floured surface and roll out evenly
Slice the dough into 6 equal portions
Flatten each portion into a circular disc
Spoon pizza sauce onto the center of each disc
Top with shredded cheese and pepperoni
Fold the dough over to form calzones and seal the edges
Lightly spray the tops with cooking spray and sprinkle with parsley
Bake for 12–15 minutes until golden brown, or air fry for 8–10 minutes until crisp
Let cool slightly before serving

name: Hawaiian Roll Garlic Parmesan Pepperoni Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Lightly spray a baking tray or baking dish
Slice the Hawaiian rolls in half horizontally, keeping them connected as one slab
Place the bottom half of the rolls onto the baking tray
Mix melted butter, garlic powder, and grated parmesan in a small bowl
Brush the garlic butter over the cut side of the rolls
Bake for 5–7 minutes until lightly toasted
Sprinkle 1 cup mozzarella evenly over the rolls
Spread pizza sauce over the cheese
Top with the remaining 1/2 cup mozzarella
Brush exposed edges with more garlic butter
Evenly distribute pepperoni slices on top
Bake for 10–12 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly
Slice and serve hot

name: High-Protein Stuffed Crust Pizza
description: Greek yogurt dough pizza with stuffed mozzarella crust
ingredients: 110 g self-raising flour (or plain flour + 1.5 tsp baking powder)
100 g low-fat or fat-free Greek yogurt
instructions: Mix flour and Greek yogurt until a dough forms
Add seasonings and nutritional yeast and knead lightly until smooth
Roll dough thin and wide on a lightly floured surface
Place mozzarella sticks around the edge, fold dough over, and press to seal the stuffed crust
Spread pizza sauce over the base
Add grated cheddar, mozzarella, and pepperoni
Bake at 200°C (392°F) for 15–20 minutes until golden and cooked through
Cool slightly, slice, and serve

name: High Protein Cheesy Garlic Parm Pizza Buns
description: Cottage Cheese Pizza Buns with Garlic
ingredients: 250 g self-rising flour (or 250 g all-purpose flour + 1.5 tsp baking powder)
6 garlic cloves, finely diced (mixed into dough)
100 g light mozzarella cheese (mixed into dough)
40 g light mozzarella cheese per bun (topping)
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F and line a baking tray with parchment paper or lightly spray with oil
Blend the cottage cheese and eggs until completely smooth
Pour into a large bowl and add flour, salt, onion powder, garlic powder, and Italian herb seasoning; mix until thick
Add the 6 diced garlic cloves, parmesan, and 100 g mozzarella; mix again until fully combined
With wet hands, divide the dough into 8 equal portions and shape into buns; place on tray
Bake for 20–30 minutes until lightly golden
Remove from oven and top each bun with pizza sauce, 5 g diced garlic, and 40 g mozzarella
Return to oven and bake for 10 minutes until cheese is melted and golden
Finish with basil, parmesan, and extra garlic if desired
